right-datatable2-specialpages:
{{doc-right|datatable2-specialpages}}
Right to use the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DataTable2|DataTable2]] special pages.
datatable2-error:
Wikitext used to format an error message. Parameters:
* $1: error message.
datatable2-error-expensive-function: Error message indicating that the expensive function limit has been exceeded.
datatable2-error-multiple-records:
Error message indicating that multiple records where found where a single one was expected. Parameters:
* $1: table name
* $2: WHERE clause
* $3: actual number of records found.
datatable2-error-no-meta:
Error message indicating that no metadata was found in the database for a table that has records. This is an internal error that should not happen and probably indicates a bug in this extension. Parameters:
* $1: table name
datatable2-error-sql-identifier:
Error message indicating that the user has used an illegal identifier in a WHERE or ORDER BY clause. This can be a typo or a function that is not listed in the global variable <tt>$wgDataTable2SqlWhiteList</tt>. Parameters:
* $1: identifier
datatable2-error-sql-token:
Error message indicating that the user has used an invalid SQL token in a WHERE or ORDER BY clause. This is typically an error in the SQL syntax entered by the user. Otherwise, it indicates a bug in this extension. Parameters:
* $1: token text
datatable2-error-sql-unterminated-commen:
Error message indicating that the user has opened a comment with /* in a WHERE or ORDER BY clause but the comment was not closed. This is an error in the SQL syntax entered by the user. Parameters:
* $1: SQL frgament where the problem was noticed
datatable2-error-table-name:
Error message indicating that the user has attempted to create a table with an invalid name. Valid table names obey the same rules as valid page names. Parameters:
* $1: table name
datatable2-error-too-few-args:
Error message indicating that the user has not given enough arguments to a parser function. Parameters:
* $1: function name
* $2: number of arguments given
* $3: number of arguments required
datatable2-error-too-many-columns:
Error message indicating that the user has attempted to create more columns than configured in the database. The number of columns can be enlarged but is rather high by default, so in most cases this is due to a syntax error when entering data. Parameters:
* $1: table name
* $2: number of columns the user attempted to create
* $3: number of available columns
datatable2-error-unterminated-tag:
Error message indicating that the parser encountered an opening tag without a closing one. Parameters:
* $1: tag name
* $2: wikitext where the opening tag was found
datatable2data: Name of special page displayed in [[Special:DataTable2Data]].
datatable2data-legend: Title of the dialog box in [[Special:DataTable2Data]].
datatable2data-noresult: Text displayed when no records are found for a given table.
datatable2data-page-column-title: Title of the column showing the page name.
datatable2pages: Name of special page displayed in [[Special:DataTable2Pages]].
datatable2pages-legend: Title of the dialog box in [[Special:DataTable2Pages]].
datatable2pages-noresult: Text displayed when no records are found.
datatable2pages-row:
Wikitext to format a data row. Parameters:
* $1: page title
* $2: table name
* $3: number of records contributed from that page to that table
datatable2tables: Name of special page displayed in [[Special:DataTable2Tables]].
datatable2tables-legend: Title of the dialog box in [[Special:DataTable2Tables]].
datatable2tables-noresult: Text displayed when no records are found.
datatable2tables-row:
Wikitext to format a data row. Parameters:
* $1: table name
* $2: number of contributing pages
* $3: number of records
* $4: Name of detail tracking category created from message datatable2-consumer-detail-category
datatable2-producer-category: Name of the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] where pages defining [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DataTable2|DataTable2]] data are listed.
datatable2-consumer-category: Name of the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] where pages using [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DataTable2|DataTable2]] data are listed.
datatable2-consumer-detail-category:
Message used to generate the name of a [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] where pages using [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DataTable2|DataTable2]] data in a particular table are listed. Parameters:
* $1: table name
